results.title: The potential hepatoprotective effect of metformin in hepatitis C virus-infected adolescent patients with beta thalassemia major: Randomised clinical trial.
results.text_hl: Both groups were receiving @<m>DISEASE_beta_Thalassemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017086 @@@beta-TM@@@ standard-of-care regimen, whereas @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (500 mg, twice daily) was added to the treatment group's regimen only.

citations.NLM: Abdel Monem MS, Farid SF, Abbassi MM, Youssry I, Andraues NG, Hassany M, Selim YMM, El-Sayed MH. The potential hepatoprotective effect of metformin in hepatitis C virus-infected adolescent patients with beta thalassemia major: Randomised clinical trial. Int J Clin Pract. 2021 Jun;75(6):e14104. PMID: 33617679

results.title: Combination Therapy with Vitamin D and Metformin: A Potential Approach to Mitigate Testicular Dysfunction in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus.
results.text_hl: However, recent findings have associated long-term @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ intake with progressive oxidative pancreatic @<m>DISEASE_beta_Thalassemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017086 @@@beta@@@ cell damage as the disease progresses.

citations.NLM: Odetayo AF, Abdulrahim HA, Yusuf AM, Aromokhame WO, Olaitan AM, Ugoji MC, Hamed MA, Olayaki LA. Combination Therapy with Vitamin D and Metformin: A Potential Approach to Mitigate Testicular Dysfunction in Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus. Reprod Sci. 2024 Sep 25;():. PMID: 39317887

results.title: Use of the SGLT2 inhibitor canagliflozin for control of refractory equine hyperinsulinemia and laminitis
results.text_hl: Ten @SPECIES_9796 @@@horses@@@ with @DISEASE_Hyperinsulinism @DISEASE_MESH:D006946 @@@hyperinsulinemia@@@ refractory to diet control, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@levothyroxine@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Pergolide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010479 @@@pergolide@@@ (if diagnosed with @<m>DISEASE_beta_Thalassemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017086 @@@PPID@@@) were treated with sodium-glucose cotransporter-2 inhibitor @CHEMICAL_Canagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068896 @@@canagliflozin@@@ (Invokana ).

citations.NLM: Kellon EM, Gustafson KM. Use of the SGLT2 inhibitor canagliflozin for control of refractory equine hyperinsulinemia and laminitis Open Vet J. 2022 Jul-Aug;12(4):511-518. PMID: 36118716

results.title: Efficacy of metformin in the treatment of diabetes mellitus complicating thalassemia major.
results.text_hl: Efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetes mellitus@@@ complicating @<m>DISEASE_beta_Thalassemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017086 @@@thalassemia major@@@.
